title: [BUG] Forms.Mac: No drawing when using SKGLView
body:
**Description**

On some Mac devices there isn't anything drawn in SKGLView on Mac.

**Code**

See [SkiaTest](https://github.com/charlenni/SkiaTest).

**Expected Behavior**

Same behavior as on SKCanvasView.

**Actual Behavior**

Nothing is drawn.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.68.2-preview.60
- Last known good version:  Unknown
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2019, 16.5.4
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - macOS:  High Sierra
- Target Devices: 
  - iMac 27", Mid 2011, High Sierra
  - But worked on a Mac Mini, End 2012, Intel HD 4000 graphics, Catalina (10.15.4)

**Screenshots**

The left side for GPU is empty, the right side for CPU is working correct.

**Reproduction Link**

See [SkiaTest](https://github.com/charlenni/SkiaTest).

Was mentioned in Mapsui Github [#892](https://github.com/Mapsui/Mapsui/issues/892).
